mapper.insert:
insert into policies (mainsite, connectingUrl, policyUrl, policy, ifByWhois, whoisRecord, date) values (#{mainsite}, #{connectingUrl}, #{policyUrl}, #{policy}, #{ifByWhois}, #{whoisRecord}, #{date})
select last_insert_id() as id
mapper.select: select * from policies where id>=#{id} and policyUrl='';
mapper.update: update policies set policyUrl=#{policyUrl} policy=#{policy} where id=#{id};
